description: Home Affairs Minister Graham Cregeen said it would be "unnecessarily restrictive".
title: Bid to cut days fireworks can be let off rejected by Tynwald
title_page: Bid to cut days fireworks can be let off rejected by Tynwald - BBC News
maintext: The committee ruled out changes to the period they could be let off at New Year's Eve as it is a shorter window and concerns had not been raised over its duration.
